name: learn-clojure
tagline: Web application for the learning clojure class
body:
# learn-clojure
A ring Compojure based web site devoted to teaching and promoting Clojure and Clojurescript.  The idea here is to provide
the information so that aspiring Clojure programmers can use the structure of the site as well as the resources to quickly get
their application off the ground.  A further goal is to use Clojurescript and explore the new paradigm of using Clojure 
and Clojurescript together to eliminate the extra complexity that ajax, json and rest sometimes add to projects

## Usage

lein ring server-headless
